_header: If it befall that God thee list visit
_description: Balade de bone counseyle — one stanza rhyme royal

CamTCC600.First Lines:
Yif hit befalle þat god þes list visyteWith any tourment
                    or Aduersytee…
CamTCC600.Last Lines:
…Make þy defence and þou shalt haue no losseþe
                    Remembrasunce of Cryst and of his crosse
